com.canoo.dolphin.client

Interface ClientContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientContextImpl

    public interface ClientContext
    The client context defines a connection to the Dolphin Platform endpoint on the server. For each client instance there should be one ClientContext instance that can be created by using the ClientContextFactory. The client context is needed to create ControllerProxy instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> CompletableFuture<ControllerProxy<T>> createController(String name)
      Creates a ControllerProxy instance for the controller with the given name.
      CompletableFuture<Void> disconnect()
      Disconnects the client context.
      ClientBeanManager getBeanManager()
      Deprecated. 
      com.canoo.dolphin.event.Subscription onRemotingError(com.canoo.dolphin.util.Callback<com.canoo.dolphin.util.DolphinRemotingException> callback)
      This methods adds an error handler for the remoting layer of the client.

    • Method Detail

      • createController

        <T> CompletableFuture<ControllerProxy<T>> createController(String name)
        Creates a ControllerProxy instance for the controller with the given name. By doing so a new instance of the matching controller class will be created on the server. The ControllerProxy can be used to communicate with the controller instance on the server. The method don't block. To get the created ControllerProxy instance CompletableFuture.get() must be called on the return value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the model that is bound to the controller and view
        Parameters:
        name - the unique name of the controller type
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture that defines the creation of the controller.

      • getBeanManager

        @Deprecated
ClientBeanManager getBeanManager()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the ClientBeanManager that is bound to the client context
        Returns:
        the bean manager

      • disconnect

        CompletableFuture<Void> disconnect()
        Disconnects the client context. The method don't block. To verify that the connection has been closed CompletableFuture.get() must be called on the return value.
        Returns:
        a CompletableFuture that defines the disconnect task.

      • onRemotingError

        com.canoo.dolphin.event.Subscription onRemotingError(com.canoo.dolphin.util.Callback<com.canoo.dolphin.util.DolphinRemotingException> callback)
        This methods adds an error handler for the remoting layer of the client. Based on the cause of the receiving DolphinRemotingException you can check what error happened.
        Parameters:
        callback - the error handler
        Returns:
        a Subscription that can be used to removePresentationModel the added error handler
